attributes.action: launch an immediate attack on iran and free our service men and woman
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why negotiate with a terorist in Iran who while the government dither this tyranical despot is building actual weapons of mass distruction. We attacked Iraq for less.
Send a message to these people return our service personell or suffer the consequences. forget the anoyance you will cause your holier than thou wife, just obliterate their nuclear instilations and do the world a favour.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
